name: Baker Technologies, Inc.
description: Provider of a customer engagement and marketing (CRM) automation platform for the cannabis industry. The company's CRM platform helps dispensaries generate more revenue and build relationships with their customers through a variety of products featuring online ordering, customer loyalty, messaging, and analytics, enabling dispensaries to generate more revenue, optimize sales and increase customer retention in the burgeoning industry.
one_liner: Provider of a customer engagement and marketing (CRM) automation platform for the cannabis industry. The company's CRM platform helps dispensaries generate more revenue and build relationships with their customers through a variety of products featuring online ordering, customer loyalty, messaging, and analytics, enabling dispensaries to generate more revenue, optimize sales and increase customer retention in the burgeoning industry.
